00025         
00026         // ----------
00027         // TestDarwin
00028         // ----------
00029         
00030         struct TestDarwin : CppUnit::TestFixture {
00031                 // -----
00032                 // tests
00033                 // -----
00034                 
00035                 void testInit1(){
00036                  DarwinBoard fourbyfour(4,4);
00037                  ostringstream oss;
00038                  oss << "Turn = 0";
00039                  oss << endl;
00040                  oss << "  0123" << endl;
00041                  oss << "0 ...." << endl;
00042                  oss << "1 ...." << endl;
00043                  oss << "2 ...." << endl;
00044                  oss << "3 ...." << endl;
00045                  CPPUNIT_ASSERT(oss.str() == fourbyfour.boardToString());
00046                 }
00047     void testInit2(){
00048                  DarwinBoard onebyfour(1,4);
00049                  ostringstream oss;
00050                  oss << "Turn = 0";
00051                  oss << endl;
00052                  oss << "  0123" << endl;
00053                  oss << "0 ...." << endl;
00054                  CPPUNIT_ASSERT(oss.str() == onebyfour.boardToString());
00055                 }
00056     void testInit3(){
00057                  DarwinBoard fourbyfourwithFood(4,4);
00058                  Food f;
00059                  Creature c(0,0,f);
00060                  fourbyfourwithFood.putCreature(1,1,c);
00061                  ostringstream oss;
00062                  oss << "Turn = 0";
00063                  oss << endl;
00064                  oss << "  0123" << endl;
00065                  oss << "0 ...." << endl;
00066                  oss << "1 .f.." << endl;
00067                  oss << "2 ...." << endl;
00068                  oss << "3 ...." << endl;
00069                  CPPUNIT_ASSERT(oss.str() == fourbyfourwithFood.boardToString());
00070                 }
00071     void testInit4(){
00072                  DarwinBoard fivebytwo(5,2);
00073                  ostringstream oss;
00074                  oss << "Turn = 0";
00075                  oss << endl;
00076                  oss << "  01" << endl;
00077                  oss << "0 .." << endl;
00078                  oss << "1 .." << endl;
00079                  oss << "2 .." << endl;
00080                  oss << "3 .." << endl;
00081                  oss << "4 .." << endl;
00082                  CPPUNIT_ASSERT(oss.str() == fivebytwo.boardToString());
00083                 }
00084     void NoOverWrite(){
00085                  DarwinBoard fourbyfourwithFood(4,4);
00086                  Food f;
00087                  Rover r;
00088                  Creature f1(0,0,f);
00089                  Creature r1(0,0,r);
00090                  fourbyfourwithFood.putCreature(1,1,f1);
00091      fourbyfourwithFood.putCreature(1,1,r1);
00092                  ostringstream oss;
00093                  oss << "Turn = 0";
00094                  oss << endl;
00095                  oss << "  0123" << endl;
00096                  oss << "0 ...." << endl;
00097                  oss << "1 .f.." << endl;
00098                  oss << "2 ...." << endl;
00099                  oss << "3 ...." << endl;
00100                  CPPUNIT_ASSERT(oss.str() == fourbyfourwithFood.boardToString());
00101                 }
00102                 // -----
00103                 // suite
00104                 // -----
00105                 
00106                 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(TestDarwin);
00107                 CPPUNIT_TEST(testInit1);
00108                 CPPUNIT_TEST(testInit2);
00109                 CPPUNIT_TEST(testInit3);
00110                 CPPUNIT_TEST(testInit4);
00111                 CPPUNIT_TEST(NoOverWrite);
00112                 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();};
